name: Love Story: Draw Physics Line
description:
▼ STORY
The plot of the game is about the journey to find the love of two balls.
Pass through 5 chapters to explore the meaning story.
◆CHAPTER 1: HEAL
◆CHAPTER 2: PROTECTION
◆CHAPTER 3: INFATUATED
◆CHAPTER 4: DESTINY
◆CHAPTER 5: HAPPY


▼ THE RULES ARE SIMPLE!

◆ Heal the broken heart by controlling two balls.
Draw lines and shapes freely to move and roll the balls.
Controls 2 balls to touch the heart.
Flexible thinking is going to become the key to victory.

◆ Share the moment of victory
You can review the moment you cleared a stage on picture screenshoot.
Share it on Facebook to show off your superior skills to your friends.
Not to mention that watching your friends’ gameplay might also become a hint!?

◆ Let's collect pens, ink, background, skins
Starting off with a simple pen, moving onto color pen, crayons and so on.
We have prepared more than 8 varieties of pens of different colors and sizes.
Collect various pens and walk through the stages.

◆ Your brain abilities will be tested
This game, continuing after Brain Wars, also tests your logical thinking and the flexibility of your mind.
As this game includes the elements of riddle and “Escape the Room” type of games, we would recommend Love Story to people who enjoy brain-type puzzles, cards and strategy games.
It might also have an impact on your children’s intellectual growth and preventing brain deterioration?

▼FEATURES

* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Draw love story
* Simple rules but a little difficult to clear the level, you'll find the addiction.
* You can also enjoy the fun of collecting pens, ink, skins, background.
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* 500+ stage interesting
* Interesting and deep story
* 5 chapter
* Each chapter brings you interesting love stories
* 8 Skins
* 8 pen
* 7 ink vials with special effects

Download 'LOVE STORY : DRAW PHYSICS LINE' for free and share your relaxing moment with friends now!
